about.title: About me
about.paragraph1:
A frontend developer who understands both technology and business.
Centered around React and Next.js,
I focus on building intuitive, user-centered web services
through diverse technical experiences.
about.paragraph2:
With experience working in multinational teams
and communication skills in Korean, English, and Japanese,
I am able to flexibly respond to business and user needs both locally and globally.

subTask: Led frontend & UI/UX renewal of Cafe24 referral plugin Incento with 10 multicultural team members
Planned and redesigned the Incent admin site to improve usability and operational efficiency
Designed business logic and improved service architecture based on user needs
Built responsive web design optimized for various devices
Improved data visualization and clarity through intuitive dashboards and simplified workflows
Developed reusable component architecture using TypeScript, Next.js, React
Optimized styling using Tailwind CSS with consistent design system
Visualized dashboard data using Chart.js and nivo
Managed data with PostgreSQL and handled secure files with AWS S3/CloudFront
Deployed stable, scalable infrastructure using Vercel
Developed crypto asset management service 'CryptoTax' using Spring MVC and Tomcat
Managed data using MySQL, MongoDB, and MyBatis
Integrated APIs from major crypto exchanges and implemented backend logic
Developed user-friendly views using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Built multilingual website using i18n and translated Korean site into English
Operated secure, efficient file storage and deployment using AWS S3/CloudFront
Designed mobile UX/UI flows using Figma
Created UX design maps and wireframes for services like pet hospitals, hotels, stores, and pools
Built websites and booking systems using HTML5, CSS, and Spring MVC
Delivered optimized UI across various devices through responsive design
Designed and implemented system and mapping structure for linking membership data across services

devEnvironment: Implemented a static CSR-focused portfolio site using Next.js
Designed a responsive UI using utility-class-based Tailwind CSS
Composed scroll-triggered animations with Framer Motion
Uploaded custom web fonts to AWS S3 and applied via `@font-face`
Built a full-viewport vertical/horizontal scroll-snap layout

Set each slide to `100vw` for full-screen display
Applied smooth slide transitions and emphasized names using Framer Motion

Designed reusable component architecture to improve maintainability

Added search by referrer/referee ID
Supported manual payout or cancellation based on reward status
